## MapView.setCacheSize() method

Sets the cache size in number of tiles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCacheSize(size: number, numVisibleTiles?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | number | The cache size in tiles. |
|  numVisibleTiles | number | The number of tiles visible, which is size/2 by default. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
